title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting a Derby database, the column icons are not being displayed in the Available Items sector.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons should be displayed.
EB:
Expected Result: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should be displayed.
Actual Result: The column icons are not being displayed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
